players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I believe we should focus on identifying the mafia among us. I have reason to suspect Diana based on my investigation last night."

You: "Based on the information we have, it seems that one of us is the mafia. Let's continue to share our findings and work together to identify them."
Diana: "Let's focus on finding the detective among us, I think they're trying to distract us from their own identity."
